_sText:
This is my new map called surf_Krow10 (krowten <- read it backwarts ;))

At first I want to say thanks to RyanS for let me use his Design used in his network maps :D

Then I want to say thanks to Bravesurf, Swat and Helix for the beta test on our clan server.

I also want thank Eric for the "back","spawn" and "down" texture :D and Komaokc for his skybox called "blue sky"

Thanks to Tetra for his great Model of my name used at spawn ! (I luv it ^^)

furthermore I want to say thanks to Sangre, Absolute and Kabo for their special help with finding bugs and beta testing.

the map:

it is a linear surf map and has 1 Bonus

System:
when the players are spawned there is a pre timer which forgives every fail the first minute. After that minute you will get teleported to Jail after every fail.
If you are in Jail you can look up: there is another timer which teleports everyone in Jail back to spawn every 30 seconds.
After another 4 minutes (with pre timer 5 minutes) the "jailback" timer stops and you will not get back to spawn again.

Bonus:
The Bonus has a counter at the beginning. It counts the fails of 1 team. 1 team is allowed to fail 7 times (after the 7 fails every fail will teleport you to jail)
There is a secret button which can reset the fail counter ONE time for ONE team.

There are several secrets in the map. I hope you enjoy finding them ^^
